concept.definition: The expansion (when in UI mode) includes all codes *and* any defined groups (in extensions).
The expanion (when in UI mode) lists the groups, and then any codes that have not been included in a group.
The expansion (when in UI mode) only includes the defined groups.

text.div:
CodeDisplayDefinition
all-codes All CodesThe expansion (when in UI mode) includes all codes *and* any defined groups (in extensions).
ungrouped Groups + Ungrouped codesThe expanion (when in UI mode) lists the groups, and then any codes that have not been included in a group.
groups-only Groups OnlyThe expansion (when in UI mode) only includes the defined groups.
